topics.body:
Now that I think of it, I once heard that there was some complaints gender roles thing in Jojo.

I can only assume they meant Suzie Q,but let's be fair. The hell is she supposed to do against wammu when a bunch of trained soldiers couldn't take down the weakest pillarman.

By the way...what happened to the first pillar man? Did Joseph just go back and kill him?

Also I said it once and I will say it again. Kara is a cheating bastard... I was hoping I'd get to see him and lisa Lisa fight.
